description.part1: I am a Full Stack Developer and System Administrator passionate about diverse technologies.
description.part2: As a polyglot, I easily navigate different languages and tools, always seeking the best solutions through adaptability and innovation.

web_dev.title: Web Development
web_dev.description: Custom website and web application development to meet your needs.

saas.title: SaaS
saas.description: Software as a Service (SaaS) development to help you manage your business.

installation.title: Software Installation
installation.description: Installation and configuration of third-party software (control panel, CMS, etc.).

admin.title: System Administration
admin.description: Server management, service configuration, troubleshooting, firewalling, optimization, etc.

help.title: Need help? Something else?
help.description: Feel free to contact me for any other request or assistance.

contact.title: Would you like to contact me?
contact.description: Feel free to send me a message using the form below. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.otherWays: You can also contact me through the following means
